subcategories.title: Authentication
subcategories.definition: Controls for verifying user and service account identity through certificates, tokens, MFA, and external identity providers.

subcategories.title: Authorization
subcategories.definition: Controls for runtime access decisions and permission enforcement through RBAC and admission controllers.

subcategories.title: RBAC Policies
subcategories.definition: Controls to scope Kubernetes API access for users, groups, and service accounts with least privilege principles.

subcategories.title: Service Account Management
subcategories.definition: Controls for managing service accounts, token binding, and preventing privilege escalation through service account abuse.

subcategories.title: Impersonation Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls to limit user impersonation capabilities and prevent unauthorized privilege escalation.

subcategories.title: Cluster Admin Restrictions
subcategories.definition: Controls to restrict cluster-admin role bindings and audit usage.

subcategories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
subcategories.definition: Controls for enforcing MFA for administrative access and privileged operations.

subcategories.title: Certificate Lifecycle Management
subcategories.definition: Controls for automated certificate rotation, renewal, and lifecycle management.

subcategories.title: Emergency Access Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls for break-glass emergency access with time limits and audit trails.

subcategories.title: Image Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for image provenance, scanning, signing, and pull-time enforcement.

subcategories.title: Runtime Security
subcategories.definition: Controls to detect and contain malicious behavior in running workloads using Falco, eBPF, and behavioral analysis.

subcategories.title: Pod Security Standards
subcategories.definition: Enforce Kubernetes Pod Security Admission/Standards at cluster and namespace levels.

subcategories.title: Workload Security
subcategories.definition: Harden workloads (pods) with least privilege, seccomp/AppArmor, capabilities, and secret use policies.

subcategories.title: Privilege Escalation Prevention
subcategories.definition: Controls to prevent privilege escalation through container capabilities and security contexts.

subcategories.title: Host Access Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls to prevent pods from accessing host namespaces, volumes, and network interfaces.

subcategories.title: Supply Chain Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for container image signing, provenance verification, SBOM management, and vulnerability scanning.

subcategories.title: Behavioral Analysis
subcategories.definition: Controls for detecting anomalous behavior using ML-based analysis and baseline comparison.

subcategories.title: Zero Trust Networking
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing zero-trust network principles with micro-segmentation and continuous verification.

subcategories.title: Service-to-Service Encryption
subcategories.definition: Controls for encrypting all service-to-service communication with mTLS and strong encryption protocols.

subcategories.title: Continuous Verification
subcategories.definition: Controls for continuously verifying and authenticating all network connections and service communications.

subcategories.title: Micro-segmentation
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing fine-grained network segmentation at the pod and service level.

subcategories.title: Network Policies
subcategories.definition: Controls to restrict pod-to-pod and egress traffic using Kubernetes NetworkPolicies.

subcategories.title: Ingress Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing ingress controllers, TLS termination, and external access to cluster services.

subcategories.title: Service Mesh Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for mTLS, traffic policies, authorization policies, and security features in service mesh implementations.

subcategories.title: DNS Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for DNS policies, CoreDNS configuration, filtering, and preventing DNS-based attacks.

subcategories.title: Egress Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls to restrict and monitor outbound traffic from pods and cluster components with DNS filtering.

subcategories.title: Traffic Encryption
subcategories.definition: Controls for encrypting network traffic in transit with strong encryption protocols and key management.

subcategories.title: Secret Storage
subcategories.definition: Controls for secure storage and retrieval of sensitive values in Kubernetes secrets.

subcategories.title: Key Rotation
subcategories.definition: Controls for automatic and manual rotation of keys and secrets with automated scheduling.

subcategories.title: Key Protection
subcategories.definition: Controls to prevent unauthorized key use and exfiltration with usage monitoring.

subcategories.title: Secret Retrieval
subcategories.definition: Controls for secure distribution of secrets to workloads.

subcategories.title: Secret Sprawl Control
subcategories.definition: Find and curb unused, stale, or over-permissive secrets with automated scanning.

subcategories.title: External Secrets Management
subcategories.definition: Controls for integrating with external secret management systems like HashiCorp Vault, AWS Secrets Manager.

subcategories.title: Secret Detection
subcategories.definition: Controls for detecting hardcoded secrets in configurations and preventing credential exposure.

subcategories.title: API Server Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing the Kubernetes API server including authentication, authorization, and audit configuration.

subcategories.title: etcd Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing etcd including encryption, access controls, and backup security.

subcategories.title: Control Plane Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing scheduler, controller manager, and other control plane components with network isolation.

subcategories.title: Kubelet Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing kubelet configuration, authentication, and API access.

subcategories.title: Kube-proxy Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing kube-proxy configuration and network proxy functionality.

subcategories.title: Hardware Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for TPM verification, secure boot, and hardware-based security attestation.

subcategories.title: Admission Control
subcategories.definition: Controls to validate/mutate API requests before persistence using built-in and custom admission controllers.

subcategories.title: Validating Admission Webhooks
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing custom validation logic through admission webhooks.

subcategories.title: Mutating Admission Webhooks
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing custom mutation logic through admission webhooks.

subcategories.title: OPA Gatekeeper
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing policy-as-code using Open Policy Agent Gatekeeper.

subcategories.title: Kyverno Policies
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing Kubernetes-native policy management using Kyverno.

subcategories.title: Policy Governance
subcategories.definition: Controls for policy testing, lifecycle management, and automated updates with GitOps integration.

subcategories.title: Persistent Volume Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing persistent volumes including access modes, storage classes, and encryption.

subcategories.title: Volume Mount Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing volume mounts including host path restrictions and volume permissions.

subcategories.title: Storage Encryption
subcategories.definition: Controls for encrypting storage at rest and in transit including CSI driver encryption.

subcategories.title: Storage Access Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls for managing storage access through RBAC and storage policies.

subcategories.title: Backup Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing storage backups with encryption and access controls.

subcategories.title: Volume Encryption
subcategories.definition: Controls for CSI driver encryption verification and key management.

subcategories.title: Audit Logging
subcategories.definition: Controls for tamper-evident trails of security-relevant actions.

subcategories.title: Log Collection
subcategories.definition: Controls to collect and aggregate security-relevant logs.

subcategories.title: Monitoring & Alerting
subcategories.definition: Controls for metrics, SLOs, and security alerting pipelines.

subcategories.title: Log Retention
subcategories.definition: Controls for retention periods, immutability, and archival.

subcategories.title: Log Analysis
subcategories.definition: Controls to analyze logs for threats and anomalies.

subcategories.title: Threat Detection
subcategories.definition: Controls for ML-based threat detection and anomaly analysis.

subcategories.title: Security Monitoring
subcategories.definition: Controls for behavioral analysis and security event correlation.

subcategories.title: Compliance Reporting
subcategories.definition: Controls for automated compliance reporting and dashboard generation.

subcategories.title: Deployment Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing deployments including resource limits, security contexts, and update strategies.

subcategories.title: DaemonSet Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing DaemonSets including host access controls and privilege requirements.

subcategories.title: StatefulSet Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing StatefulSets including persistent storage and identity management.

subcategories.title: CronJob Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing CronJobs including time-based execution and resource constraints.

subcategories.title: Job Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing Jobs including completion policies and resource management.

subcategories.title: Workload Identity
subcategories.definition: Controls for workload identity verification and service mesh authentication.

subcategories.title: Resource Governance
subcategories.definition: Controls for resource governance policies and enforcement across workloads.

subcategories.title: Node Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing worker nodes including OS hardening, container runtime security, and host-level protections.

subcategories.title: Container Runtime Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing container runtimes including containerd, CRI-O, and Docker configurations.

subcategories.title: CNI Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing Container Network Interface implementations and network plugins.

subcategories.title: CSI Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for securing Container Storage Interface drivers and storage plugins.

subcategories.title: Host-Level Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for EDR integration, host-based intrusion detection, and endpoint security.

subcategories.title: Network Plugin Security
subcategories.definition: Controls for network plugin security verification and CNI encryption.

subcategories.title: Data Loss Prevention
subcategories.definition: Controls for preventing data exfiltration and unauthorized data access with DLP policies.

subcategories.title: Privacy Controls
subcategories.definition: Controls for GDPR compliance, data retention, and privacy protection.

subcategories.title: Data Classification
subcategories.definition: Controls for classifying and labeling data based on sensitivity levels.

subcategories.title: Cross-Border Data Transfer
subcategories.definition: Controls for managing data transfer across geographic boundaries and compliance.

subcategories.title: Automated Incident Response
subcategories.definition: Controls for automated incident containment and response playbooks.

subcategories.title: Forensic Capabilities
subcategories.definition: Controls for incident forensics, evidence collection, and preservation.

subcategories.title: Threat Hunting
subcategories.definition: Controls for proactive threat hunting and security investigation.

subcategories.title: Security Orchestration
subcategories.definition: Controls for security orchestration and automated response workflows.

subcategories.title: Namespace Governance
subcategories.definition: Controls for managing namespace-level policies, resource quotas, and security boundaries.

subcategories.title: Resource Governance
subcategories.definition: Controls for managing resource quotas, limits, and governance across the cluster.

subcategories.title: Compliance Frameworks
subcategories.definition: Controls for implementing compliance with frameworks like CIS Kubernetes Benchmark, NIST, and SOC 2.

subcategories.title: Drift Detection
subcategories.definition: Controls for detecting configuration drift and maintaining desired state compliance.

subcategories.title: Policy-as-Code
subcategories.definition: Controls for GitOps integration and policy lifecycle management.

subcategories.title: Compliance Automation
subcategories.definition: Controls for automated compliance reporting and remediation.

subcategories.title: Risk Management
subcategories.definition: Controls for risk assessment integration and compliance prioritization.
